text: Patrick Burgener (born 1 June 1994) is a Swiss snowboarder who competed in the men's halfpipe at the 2018 Winter Olympics. He finished 5th overall. He also earned a bronze medal in the halfpipe event at the FIS Freestyle Ski and Snowboarding World Championships 2017. ==References== ==External links== *Official website * Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:Swiss male snowboarders Category:Olympic snowboarders of Switzerland Category:Snowboarders at the 2018 Winter Olympics
title: Patrick Burgener
